snippet: Mercy for Animals, an animal rights organization, released video this week documenting what activists are calling the torture of pigs by workers at a Minnesota pork farm that supplies Walmart.
abstract: Mercy for Animals, an animal rights organization, released video this week documenting what activists are calling the torture of pigs by workers at a Minnesota pork farm that supplies Walmart.

byline.original: By NATALIE KITROEFF and ROBERT MACKEY

headline.main: Activists Accuse Walmart of Condoning Torture of Pigs by Pork Suppliers

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Humane Society of the United States
